about.txt.content: Chad Lindemood is an IT professional specializing in cloud and systems administration, endpoint management, and network security.

cloud.txt.content: Azure, Active Directory, Windows Server, VMware ESXi.

network.txt.content: SonicWall, Sophos, VPN, UniFi, Veeam backups.

experience.txt.content: Experience spanning Tier 2 Escalations, Field Technician, IT Service Desk roles, Stay-at-Home Father, Flooring Installer, and Signals Intelligence Analyst.

education.txt.content: WGU – B.S. Cloud Computing (expected Dec 2024); ACI Learning – Tech Bootcamp.

certifications.txt.content: Azure Administrator, AWS Cloud Practitioner, CompTIA A+, Network+, Security+, ITIL 4.

contact.txt.content: Reach Chad at chad.lindemood@gmail.com or (765) 470-3525 in Canal Fulton, OH.
